detail_desc: Sandals in imitation suede with straps over the foot and ribbed elastic around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels, 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in soft viscose jersey. Seam at the waist with a draped knot detail and a circular skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Scarf in woven fabric.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, an elasticated waist, and skirt with gathered seams. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif front and back.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with plastic beads on the front.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short, fitted style.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, knot detail at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Thin metal chain necklace with pendants.
Jersey top with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Top in a ribbed cotton and viscose blend with long trumpet sleeves and an overlocked edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in cotton jersey with a collar and skirt in pleated velour. The bodysuit has a small opening and button at the back of the neck and press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with an opening and ties.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Square scarf in a patterned silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with fringes along the sides. Size approx. 110x110 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
Hairband in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Joggers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a soft, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist, decorative tabs with a button at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with smocking at the top and hem, and short sleeves with narrow elastication.
Short lace dress with a scallop-edged V-neck front and back. Long sleeves with a scalloped edge at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Partly lined.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bell-shaped, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and buttons down the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist with wide ribbing at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Top in cotton jersey with decorative bows at the top an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Calf-length circular skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed button and zip at one side. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine, compact knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and long ties at the hem. Satin lining.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long, double-breasted, A-line coat in a recycled wool blend. Oversized notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, flap front pockets, side pockets and high slits in the sides. Lined.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.

Set with a T-shirt and matching pair of shorts in soft cotton. Classic T-shirt in solid colour jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in a patterned weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Fine-knit socks.

Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a round neck with a V-neck opening and ties at the front and long raglan sleeves with a flounce down the sides. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves that have a gathered seam at the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Set with a long-sleeved top in soft jersey and pair of dungarees in sweatshirt fabric, both made from organic cotton. Dungarees with a kangaroo pocket, adjustable straps with a press-stud, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a rib-trimmed neckline.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with elastication at the top and a woven flounce with broderie anglaise.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a print motif, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Knee-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hoop earrings with a textured finish. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Shoulder bag in quilted imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastening. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 5.5 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 21 cm.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Side pockets, an elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.
